item.content:encoded:
[vc_row fullwidth="yes"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Top reasons to get the Rewards Credit Card

  • Earn 10 Reward Points for every Rs 125 spent at apparel & department stores and select partners.
  • Continue earning Reward Points at rate of 1 point for every Rs 125 on all other purchases.
  • Redeem points instantly at select partners.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth="yes"][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs style="modern" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="Benefits & Features" tab_id="1506074109100-2c31e071-c0c9"][vc_column_text]

Earn unlimited 10X reward points at select partners

  • Earn unlimited 10X reward points at select partners
  • Maecenas sit amet tellus at ligula condimentumgravida ei pharetra eulla eu justo mvariusam.
  • Aliquam erat volucongue lectus. Morbi p. Sed consequat metus tortor, vel rhoncus orci tempor vel.
  • Luctus quam quis mi sagittis venuis consequat facnunc amet fermentumum.

Welcome rewards

  • Get 1,500 bonus points on your first spend made within 30 days of card issue.
  • Get 1,000 bonus points on your first spend of Rs. 1000 made within 60 days of card issue.

Earn bonus reward points

  • Bonus on monthly Spends: Get 300 bonus points on card spends of $1500 or more in a month.
  • Maecenas pharetra augue ut nibh blandit, eget pellentesque orci rhoncus.

Points that never expire

  • Phasellus nec nisl eu metus porttitor consequat.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Fees & Charges" tab_id="1506074109154-def204f9-8852"][vc_column_text]

Flexibility Fee and Charges

  • Interest Rate
    3.25% per month (40% per annum). This can change periodically based on your spend, payback and utilization patterns.
  • Annual Fee
    Your annual fee of Rs1000 is waived on making spends of Rs30,000 in a membership year.
For further details, pleaseClick here
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Redeem Rewards" tab_id="1506074178173-70b75c9c-ba47"][vc_column_text]

Fuel

  • Instant redemption at over 1200 participating oil outlets.
  • Redemption rate at oil outlets: 1 Reward Point = Rs 0.25 | Minimum Points required to redeem: 250.

In-Store Shopping

  • Instant redemption at select partner stores.
  • Redemption rate at stores: 1 Reward Point = INR 0.30 | Minimum Points required to redeem: 250.

Air miles

  • Redemption rate for air miles: 1 Reward Point = 0.75 miles | Minimum Points required to redeem: 100.

Cash back

  • Adjust points against your Statement outstanding.
  • Redemption rate for cash back: 1 Reward Point = Rs 0.35 | Minimum Points required to redeem: 5,000.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Borrow Privileges" tab_id="1506074208615-fc2a3a62-4f4a"][vc_column_text]

Personal Concierge Services

Call your concierge for help with planning a party, sending flowers, making dining reservations, for travel assistance.
  • Dining Privileges
    Up to 15% savings across participating restaurants.
  • Shopping Privileges
    Enjoy savings and offers several stores in your City.
  • EMI Privileges
    Choose easy EMI options at more than 2,000 consumer electronics and mobile phone outlets, leading retail chains and e-retailers.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1498124259540{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Loan & Amortization Calculator

The Loan and Amortization Calculator is a professional, high quality, and highly customizable calculator and can be used for Mortgage, Auto or any kind of amortized loan. It can be inserted on a page or used as a widget, even multiple times. Completely translation ready and support for many different currency formats. Clean, material design will look great in any WordPress standards compliant theme.[/vc_column_text][shmac_calc_sc][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1498124265381{padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Use Different Currency Formats & Symbols

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][shmac_calc_sc allowoverrides="enable" primarycolor="#f44336" calctitle="Amortization In Euros" emailtext="Receive a PDF Copy" emaillabel="Your Email" amountlabel="Loan Amount" amountinfo="The total purchase price of the home you wish to buy." defaultpurchase="300.000,00" interestlabel="Interest Rate (%)" interestinfo="The expected percent interest rate you will get on your loan." defaultinterest="5.5" downpaylabel="Down Payment (%)" downpayinfo="The percent down payment you wish to put towards the home." downpaytype="percent" defaultdown="10" termlabel="Term" terminfo="The length of time it will take to repay the loan amount (15 years is common)." defaultterm="15" disclaimer="Calculations by this calculator are estimates only. There is no warranty for the accuracy of the results or the relationship to your financial situation." currencysymbol="" currencyformat="2" currencyside="left" calcsubmit="Calculate" calcreset="Reset"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][shmac_calc_sc allowoverrides="enable" primarycolor="#00bfa5" calctitle="Amortization In Pounds" emailtext="Receive a PDF Copy" emaillabel="Your Email" amountlabel="Loan Amount" amountinfo="The total purchase price of the home you wish to buy." defaultpurchase="285.000,00" interestlabel="Interest Rate (%)" interestinfo="The expected percent interest rate you will get on your loan." defaultinterest="5.5" downpaylabel="Down Payment (%)" downpayinfo="The percent down payment you wish to put towards the home." downpaytype="percent" defaultdown="10" termlabel="Term" terminfo="The length of time it will take to repay the loan amount (15 years is common)." defaultterm="15" disclaimer="Calculations by this calculator are estimates only. There is no warranty for the accuracy of the results or the relationship to your financial situation." currencysymbol="" currencyformat="2" currencyside="left" calcsubmit="Calculate" calcreset="Reset"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1498124270371{padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Use Optional Slider Inputs

[/vc_column_text][shmac_calc_sc allowoverrides="enable" slideroverrides="enable" enable_slideroverride="enable" inputreadonly="disable" slider_theme="broad" primarycolor="#1e73be" calctitle="Slider Inputs" emailtext="Send A PDF report to your email?" emaillabel="Your Email" amountlabel="Loan Amount" amountinfo="The total purchase price of the home you wish to buy." defaultpurchase="255,000.00" sliderminamount="180,000.00" slidermaxamount="700,000.00" sliderstepsamount="5000" interestlabel="Interest Rate (%)" interestinfo="The expected percent interest rate you will get on your loan." defaultinterest="5.2" slidermininterest="1" slidermaxinterest="25.0" sliderstepsinterest="1.000" downpaylabel="Down Payment (%)" downpayinfo="The percent down payment you wish to put towards the home." downpaytype="amount" defaultdown="0.00" slidermindown="0.00" slidermaxdown="70,000.00" sliderstepsdown="5,000.00" termlabel="Term" terminfo="The length of time it will take to repay the loan amount (30 years is common)." defaultterm="30" sliderminterm="1" slidermaxterm="90" sliderstepsterm="1" disclaimer="Calculations by this calculator are estimates only. There is no warranty for the accuracy of the results or the relationship to your financial situation." currencysymbol="$" currencyformat="1" currencyside="left" calcsubmit="Calculate" calcreset="Reset"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1498121289290{padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Full of Features

[/vc_column_text][vc_tta_accordion color="blue" active_section="4"][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-home" add_icon="true" title="Professional" tab_id="1498119837011-da430f3d-592d"][vc_column_text]Perfect for real estate agents & lenders to give your visitors a professional and informative amortization schedule both on page & as a PDF report sent to them. Includes estimates for PMI, Insurance, and taxes (which can be disabled as well).[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-user-add" add_icon="true" title="Lead Capture" tab_id="1498119837082-77e89273-5ffd"][vc_column_text]Use it to capture leads by receiving a copy of the PDF amortization schedule they generate (along with their email), so youll know what kind of loan and price they are considering.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-cube" add_icon="true" title="Visual Composer Integration" tab_id="1498119982982-c564a24c-2ab2"][vc_column_text]The amortization calculator is also integrated with Visual Composer for easy drag and drop placement and settings override capability. You can add it easily to any page and create multiple separate purposed calculators! [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-retweet" add_icon="true" title="Back End Configuration" tab_id="1498120130466-7825d38a-d04b"][vc_column_text]Includes many options for customizing the calculator on the back end. No digging through code or files to change settings![/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-cog" add_icon="true" title="Customizable" tab_id="1498120222428-bf1bce0a-fa3d"][vc_column_text]Customize colors, texts, report logo, information displayed in forms, output and email. It even has a custom CSS field on the back-end and you can give each calculator a specific class for styling differently.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-mobile" add_icon="true" title="Responsive" tab_id="1498120291464-35ac28bf-3193"][vc_column_text]Designed to be responsive, even the amortization schedule generated collapses on small screens for readability![/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-check" add_icon="true" title="Currency Formats" tab_id="1498120330729-0095630f-50d9"][vc_column_text]Multiple currency formats are available in forms and reports with the change of an option. Any currency symbol can be used. Support the currency of all countries in the world.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-flag" add_icon="true" title="Translatable" tab_id="1498120464097-8e4f3000-97ee"][vc_column_text]The calculator is completely ready to translate with included language files and text fields you can change.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-info" add_icon="true" title="Not Just Mortgages" tab_id="1498120518591-3a50fcf0-c763"][vc_column_text]Not just for mortgage amortization, use it for other types of amortization as well e.g. auto loans.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Send A PDF report to your email?

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="874" img_size="full"][vc_btn title=" Example PDF Report" color="primary" i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-file-pdf-o" add_icon="true" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.oceanthemes.net%2Fborrow%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2017%2F06%2Famortization-09-21-2015.pdf|title:%20Example%20PDF%20Report|target:%20_blank|"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
